item.title: 特朗普高官在基辅讨论矿产和能源协议
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周三访问了基辅，讨论一项重要的矿产交易，乌克兰正在与俄罗斯交战的危险外交关头争取美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的支持。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent visited Kyiv on Wednesday to discuss a critical minerals deal as Ukraine vies to win the backing of U.S. President Donald Trump at a perilous diplomatic juncture in the war with Russia.】

item.title: 德国在集团部长会议上表示，欧盟应通过谈判避免贸易战
item.description: 德国经济部周三在欧盟部长视频会议前表示，欧盟应集中精力与华盛顿谈判，避免跨大西洋贸易战，同时做好反制措施的准备。【原文：The European Union should focus on negotiating with Washington to avert a transatlantic trade war while being ready with countermeasures, Germany's economy ministry said on Wednesday, ahead of a video conference of EU ministers.】

item.title: 广告支出疲软，Interpublic 季度业绩不及预期
item.description: 由于美国等主要市场的客户削减了广告支出，Interpublic 集团周三公布的第四季度业绩不及预期。【原文：Interpublic Group missed estimates for fourth-quarter results on Wednesday, as clients in major markets like the U.S. cut back on ad spending.】

item.title: 公用事业公司 Exelon 预测 2025 年利润高于预期
item.description: Exelon 公司周三预测年度利润将高于华尔街预期，因为这家美国公用事业公司预计将受益于电力和天然气费率的上涨。【原文：Exelon forecast annual profit above Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, as the U.S. utility expects to benefit from higher rates for electricity and natural gas.】

item.title: 乌克兰石墨矿希望与特朗普达成协议，但表示回报不会立竿见影
item.description: 在乌克兰中部拥有 90 年历史的 Zavallivsky 石墨矿，首席执行官 Ostap Kostyuk 梦想着将纯度足够高的石墨用于锂电池，但由于缺乏投资，他将此比作 "在车库里制造劳斯莱斯"。【原文：At the 90-year-old Zavallivsky Graphite Mine in central Ukraine, CEO Ostap Kostyuk dreams of making graphite pure enough to use for lithium batteries, something he compares to trying to "make a Rolls-Royce inside a garage", given the lack of investment.】

item.title: 对冲活动强劲，CME 集团第四季度利润上升
item.description: 交易所运营商芝加哥商品交易所集团（CME Group）周三公布第四季度利润增长，原因是投资者希望降低地缘政治和经济不确定性带来的风险，从而增加了对冲活动。【原文：Exchange operator CME Group reported a higher fourth-quarter profit on Wednesday, helped by increased hedging activity by investors looking to mitigate risks from geopolitical and economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 克罗格任命百事公司高管大卫-肯纳利为下一任首席财务官
item.description: 克罗格公司周三表示，百事公司高管大卫-肯纳利（David Kennerley）将接替托德-福里（Todd Foley）担任公司首席财务官，4 月 3 日起生效。【原文：Kroger said on Wednesday PepsiCo executive David Kennerley would succeed Todd Foley as the company's chief financial officer, effective April 3.】

item.title: 机票价格上涨提振航空公司利润前景
item.description: 有限的运力和强劲的消费需求缓解了航空公司为填满飞机而打折的压力，航空公司正在灵活运用定价权。【原文：Airlines are flexing their pricing power as limited capacity and strong consumer demand have eased pressure to discount fares to fill their planes.】

item.title: 卡夫亨氏预测年度利润低于预期
item.description: 卡夫亨氏（Kraft Heinz）周三预计全年利润低于预期，季度销售额也不及预期，因为这家包装食品生产商在涨价后面临着午餐肉和包装肉等产品需求低迷的问题。【原文：Kraft Heinz forecast annual profit below estimates and missed quarterly sales estimates on Wednesday, as the packaged food maker faces sluggish demand for its products such as Lunchables and packaged meat following price hikes.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称，吉利与雷诺正在就巴西的销售和生产交易进行谈判
item.description: 三位消息人士称，法国汽车制造商雷诺及其中国合作伙伴吉利汽车（GEELY.UL）计划在本月晚些时候宣布一项协议，将双方的合作扩展到巴西。【原文：French automaker Renault and its Chinese partner Geely (GEELY.UL) plan to announce a deal later this month on expanding their cooperation to Brazil, three sources said, as they seek new growth markets amid broadening global trade wars.】

item.title: TE Connectivity 将以约 23 亿美元收购 Richards Manufacturing
item.description: TE Connectivity 公司周三表示，将以约 23 亿美元现金从橡树资本管理公司（Oaktree Capital Management）管理的基金和比尔家族成员手中收购理查兹制造公司（Richards Manufacturing Co），旨在拓展能源市场。【原文：TE Connectivity said on Wednesday it would buy Richards Manufacturing Co from funds managed by Oaktree Capital Management and members of the Bier family for about $2.3 billion in cash, aiming to expand in the energy market.】

item.title: 美国制裁使伊朗和俄罗斯的石油滞留在油轮上，导致原油成本上升
item.description: 贸易消息人士和分析师称，由于美国更严厉的制裁措施减少了买家数量，导致可用来运送货物的油轮数量减少，并推高了原油成本，俄罗斯和伊朗的石油装船量创下了多个月来的新高。【原文：The amount of Russian and Iranian oil held on ships has hit multi-month highs as harsher U.S. sanctions reduced the number of buyers, leaving fewer tankers available to deliver cargoes and driving up crude costs, trade sources and analysts said.】

item.title: 谷歌首席执行官皮查伊称中国的 DeepSeek 做得非常好
item.description: Alphabet 首席执行官桑达尔-皮查伊（Sundar Pichai）说，中国初创公司 DeepSeek 做了非常出色的工作，展示了人工智能的全球化程度。【原文：Alphabet CEO Sundar Pichai said Chinese startup DeepSeek has done very good work that showed how global artificial intelligence is.】

item.title: 制药商百健公司预测 2025 年利润低于预期
item.description: 受美元走强和治疗多发性硬化症药物竞争激烈的影响，百健公司周三预测 2025 年利润低于华尔街预期。【原文：Biogen forecast 2025 profit below Wall Street expectations on Wednesday, hurt by a strong dollar and fierce competition for its drugs to treat multiple sclerosis.】

item.title: 荷兰首相承诺采取行动帮助科技初创企业蓬勃发展
item.description: 荷兰首相迪克-肖夫（Dick Schoof）表示，荷兰政府正在努力促进该国技术初创企业的发展并吸引风险投资，因为周三的行业研究显示该行业正在衰退。【原文：Dutch Prime Minister Dick Schoof said his government was seeking to boost the country's technical startups and lure venture capital, after industry research on Wednesday showed the sector was flagging.】

item.title: 汉堡王母公司 Restaurant Brands 因需求强劲，收入超出预期
item.description: 餐厅品牌公司（Restaurant Brands）周三公布的季度收入超出了市场预期，这主要得益于汉堡王连锁店对超值餐饮的强劲需求，以及蒂姆-霍顿斯咖啡店的强劲表现。【原文：Restaurant Brands on Wednesday topped market expectations for quarterly revenue, helped by strong demand for value meals at its Burger King chain and strength in its Tim Hortons coffee outlets.】

item.title: 医疗成本降低，CVS Health 季度利润超出预期
item.description: CVS Health 周三公布的第四季度利润降幅小于预期，原因是这家医疗保健企业集团的医疗费用增长速度放缓，而药房业务的收入则大幅增长，这使其股价在盘前交易中上涨了 9% 以上。【原文：CVS Health reported a smaller-than-expected drop in fourth-quarter profit on Wednesday as the pace of medical cost increases slowed at the healthcare conglomerate and revenues jumped in its pharmacy business, sending its shares up more than 9% in premarket trading.】

item.title: Randstad 首席执行官表示，尽管德国工业发展指数发生变化，美国公司仍将致力于营造包容性环境
item.description: 荷兰人才派遣巨头兰斯塔德公司（Randstad）首席执行官周三表示，"头条新闻比现实更暗淡"，因为一些美国公司正在改变其多样性、公平性和包容性（DEI）政策，而这些政策正是唐纳德-特朗普总统所针对的。【原文：The CEO of Dutch staffing giant Randstad said on Wednesday "the headlines are bleaker than the reality" as some U.S. companies change their diversity, equity and inclusion (DEI) policies targeted by President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 美国：通胀、关税解析，世界趋于平静
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 巴里克黄金公司利润超出预期；宣布回购新股
item.description: 加拿大巴里克黄金公司（Barrick Gold）周三公布的第四季度利润超出分析师预期，原因是金价和产量均有所增长。【原文：Canada's Barrick Gold beat analysts' estimates for fourth-quarter profit on Wednesday on higher gold prices and production.】

item.title: 迄今为止，马斯克的削减更多是基于政治意识形态，而非真正的成本节约
item.description: 两位资深共和党预算专家表示，特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）和美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）为削减政府机构的浪费所做的第一阶段快速努力，似乎更多是出于对保守派长期憎恨的联邦机构的意识形态攻击，而不是为节省纳税人的钱而做出的真诚努力。【原文：The first phase of the rapid-fire effort by Tesla CEO Elon Musk and President Donald Trump to cut waste from government agencies appears driven more by an ideological assault on federal agencies long hated by conservatives than a good-faith effort to save taxpayer dollars, according to two veteran Republican budget experts.】

item.title: 竞争激烈影响预订量预期，Lyft股价下挫
item.description: Lyft 周三在盘前交易中股价大跌 12.5%，此前该公司预计第一季度总预订量疲软，因为它正与更大的竞争对手优步科技公司（Uber Technologies）争夺更多乘客。【原文：Lyft shares slumped 12.5% in premarket trading on Wednesday after the company forecast weak gross bookings for the first quarter, as it battles with larger rival Uber Technologies to attract more riders.】

item.title: 最新通胀测试前期货价格低迷
item.description: 周三，美国股指期货走势平淡，因为在一项可能影响美联储今年利率走势的重要通胀数据公布之前，投资者没有下大赌注。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were muted on Wednesday, as investors refrained from making big bets ahead of a crucial inflation reading which could influence the Federal Reserve's interest rate path this year.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称，特朗普准备出席二月份在迈阿密举行的沙特支持的会议
item.description: 据几位知情人士透露，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普将出席沙特阿拉伯主权财富基金二月晚些时候在迈阿密举办的全球金融家和科技高管会议。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump is scheduled to attend a meeting of global financiers and tech executives hosted by Saudi Arabia's sovereign wealth fund in Miami later in February, according to several people with knowledge of the event.】

item.title: 大众 14 亿美元印度税款纠纷重燃外国投资者担忧
item.description: 印度对追溯征税的要求再次引发了人们对冗长诉讼影响的担忧。【原文：India's demand for retrospective taxes is reigniting concerns of the impact of lengthy litigation.】

item.title: 特朗普维持与日本的 "阿耳特弥斯 "登月计划，登月公司 ispace 信心满满
item.description: 总部位于东京的月球探测公司 ispace 首席执行官周三表示，在特朗普 2.0 时期美国太空政策的不确定性日益增加的情况下，有迹象表明美国和日本仍将在联合月球任务方面保持一致，这令该公司感到振奋。【原文：Tokyo-based moon exploration company ispace is heartened by signs the United States and Japan will remain on course for joint lunar missions, its CEO said on Wednesday, amid growing uncertainties in U.S. space policies under Trump 2.0.】

item.title: 阿霍德-德尔海泽首席执行官认为美国对加拿大和墨西哥征收关税将推动价格上涨
item.description: 超市集团阿霍德-德尔海兹（Ahold Delhaize）首席执行官弗兰斯-穆勒（Frans Muller）周三告诉路透社，预计美国对墨西哥和加拿大征收的关税将导致食品、蔬菜和纸制品价格上涨。【原文：Supermarket group Ahold Delhaize expects U.S. tariffs on Mexico and Canada to lead to price increases for food and vegetables as well as paper products, group CEO Frans Muller told Reuters on Wednesday.】

item.title: 经济学家称，韩国自由贸易协定可限制特朗普对等关税的影响
item.description: 两家大型投资银行的经济学家表示，韩国与美国签署的自由贸易协定可能有助于减轻其在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁征收对等关税时所面临的风险。【原文：South Korea's free trade agreement with the United States could help mitigate its exposure to reciprocal tariffs threatened by U.S. President Donald Trump, economists at two major investment banks have said.】

item.title: 阿霍德德尔海兹销售额超预期，得益于强劲的美国假日销售和欧洲市场的推动
item.description: 超市集团阿霍德-德尔海兹（Ahold Delhaize）周三公布的第四季度销售额略高于预期，这主要得益于其美国杂货店强劲的假日销售以及其荷兰连锁店阿尔伯特-海因（Albert Heijn）市场份额的增长。【原文：Supermarket group Ahold Delhaize reported slightly higher-than-expected sales for the fourth quarter on Wednesday, thanks to strong holiday sales at its U.S. grocery stores and market share gains by its Dutch chain Albert Heijn.】

item.title: 咨询公司称 2025 年中国芯片制造设备采购量将下降
item.description: 一家咨询公司周三表示，中国芯片制造设备的采购量在经历了三年的增长后，今年将出现下降，因为该行业正在努力解决产能过剩问题，并面临美国制裁带来的更大限制。【原文：China's purchases of chipmaking equipment are set to decline this year after three years of growth, as the industry grapples with overcapacity and faces greater constraints from U.S. sanctions, a consultancy said on Wednesday.】
